whole_object: Contrary to popular belief, this apple refused to keep the doctor away - it's signed up for med school instead!
single_object:
- Apple: This apple is feeling a bit peckish, itching to take a byte out of life!
- Water bottle: The water bottle's dreams of being a pop star burst when it realized it could only do water-falls.
- Plate: After the meal, the plate couldn't help but dish out its empty feelings.
- Fork: The fork always thought its life had a point until it met a spoon.
- Glasses: The glasses didn't see the humor until they looked at everything with a tint of irony.
- Sauce packet: This sauce packet is just trying to ketch-up with the rest of the condiments.
- Bowl: The bowl went on strike wanting to be recognized for carrying the weight of every meal.
- Pan: The pan always wanted to be in the limelight, but it just kept getting burned.
- Chair: The chair complained about always being taken for granite until it stood up for itself.
- Napkin: The napkin was torn between folding under pressure and wiping away its problems.
multi_object:
- Apple  
- Water bottle  
- "I told the water bottle to stay hydrated, but it just couldn't ketchup with my apple-a-day routine!"  

- Water bottle  
- Plate  
- "The water bottle tried to make a splash, but the plate just said, 'I'm already full of drama!'"  

- Plate  
- Fork  
- "The plate and fork had a heated debate, but in the end, they decided to just dish it out!"  

- Fork  
- Glasses  
- "The fork tried to impress the glasses, but they just couldn't see the point!"  

- Glasses  
- Sauce packet  
- "The glasses thought the sauce packet was a little too saucy for their taste!"  

- Sauce packet  
- Bowl  
- "The sauce packet claimed it was the life of the party, but the bowl just said, 'I’m the one holding all the fun!'"  

- Bowl  
- Pan  
- "The bowl told the pan it was tired of being empty, but the pan just said, 'You need to stir things up!'"  

- Pan  
- Chair  
- "The pan tried to sit on the chair, but the chair said, 'I can't handle that kind of heat!'"  

- Chair  
- Napkin  
- "The chair asked the napkin for a clean slate, but the napkin replied, 'I’m just here to wipe the slate clean!'"  

- Napkin  
- Apple  
- "The napkin was ready for a spill, but the apple just rolled its eyes and said, 'I’m not that kind of fruit!'"

single_object_dict.Water bottle: The water bottle's dreams of being a pop star burst when it realized it could only do water-falls.
single_object_dict.Plate: After the meal, the plate couldn't help but dish out its empty feelings.

multi_object_dict.object_sentence: "I told the water bottle to stay hydrated, but it just couldn't ketchup with my apple-a-day routine!"
"The water bottle tried to make a splash, but the plate just said, 'I'm already full of drama!'"
"The plate and fork had a heated debate, but in the end, they decided to just dish it out!"
"The fork tried to impress the glasses, but they just couldn't see the point!"
"The glasses thought the sauce packet was a little too saucy for their taste!"
"The sauce packet claimed it was the life of the party, but the bowl just said, 'I’m the one holding all the fun!'"
"The bowl told the pan it was tired of being empty, but the pan just said, 'You need to stir things up!'"
"The pan tried to sit on the chair, but the chair said, 'I can't handle that kind of heat!'"
"The chair asked the napkin for a clean slate, but the napkin replied, 'I’m just here to wipe the slate clean!'"
"The napkin was ready for a spill, but the apple just rolled its eyes and said, 'I’m not that kind of fruit!'"
